title: After Rebirth, She Spoiled the Paranoid Master Ji - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: Hao Anyi
description: In the previous life, Ye He was a pure white lotus. She was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister, killed herself and the so-called Prince of the Capital who put her on the top of his heart. Reborn three years ago, the man’s breath lingered around her, voice cold, “Ye He, do you really hate me so much?” This was the day she was deceived to assassinate him. Fortunately, everything reverted back. Now, at present, Ye He’s IQ is online, and she is determined to be a black lotus.>
